results.title: Feline comorbidities: The intermingled relationship between chronic kidney disease and hypertension.
results.text_hl: Current guidelines recommend a target systolic blood pressure of <160 mmHg to minimise risk of @<m>DISEASE_Organizing_Pneumonia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000092124 @@@TOD@@@. Both @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine besylate@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Telmisartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077333 @@@telmisartan@@@ are effective antihypertensive agents for use in these @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

citations.NLM: Lawson JS, Jepson RE. Feline comorbidities: The intermingled relationship between chronic kidney disease and hypertension. J Feline Med Surg. 2021 Sep;23(9):812-822. PMID: 34428941

results.title: Anti-PL-12 anti-synthetase syndrome manifesting with multiple digital ischemia: Case report & review of the literature.
results.text_hl: Chest imaging and later lung biopsy were notable for @<m>DISEASE_Organizing_Pneumonia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000092124 @@@organizing pneumonia@@@.

results.title: Long term effects of amlodipine on organ damage, stroke and life span in stroke prone spontaneously hypertensive rats.
results.text_hl: These results indicate that the long term treatment of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ suppresses the incidence of @<m>DISEASE_Organizing_Pneumonia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000092124 @@@organ damage@@@ and @DISEASE_Stroke @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@ in SHRSPs and prolongs their life span.

results.title: Role of olmesartan in combination therapy in blood pressure control and vascular function
results.text_hl: This article summarizes the evidence for the combined use of the AT1 selective receptor antagonist, @CHEMICAL_Olmesartan_Medoxomil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068557 @@@olmesartan medoxomil@@@, with @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ on blood pressure control and @<m>DISEASE_Organizing_Pneumonia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000092124 @@@target organ damage@@@.

results.title: Influence of fixed-dose combination perindopril/amlodipine on target organ damage in patients with arterial hypertension with and without ischemic heart disease (results of EPHES trial)
results.text_hl: The EPHES trial (Evaluation of influence of fixed dose combination @CHEMICAL_Perindopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020913 @@@Perindo-pril@@@/@<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Organizing_Pneumonia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000092124 @@@target organ damage@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with arterial HypErtension with or without @DISEASE_Myocardial_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D017202 @@@iSchemic heart disease@@@) compared the dynamics of @<m>DISEASE_Organizing_Pneumonia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000092124 @@@target organ damage@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Organizing_Pneumonia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000092124 @@@TOD@@@) in @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with and without @DISEASE_Myocardial_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D017202 @@@ischemic heart disease@@@ (@DISEASE_Myocardial_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D017202 @@@IHD@@@) treated with the fixed-dose combination (FDC) @CHEMICAL_Perindopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020913 @@@perindopril@@@ + @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@.

results.title: Aggressive blood pressure-lowering therapy guided by home blood pressure monitoring improves target organ damage in hypertensive patients with type 2 diabetes/prediabetes.
results.text_hl: The authors tested the hypothesis that an aggressive antihypertensive treatment is beneficial in protecting against @<m>DISEASE_Organizing_Pneumonia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000092124 @@@target organ damage@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Organizing_Pneumonia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000092124 @@@TOD@@@) in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes@@@/@DISEASE_Prediabetic_State @DISEASE_MESH:D011236 @@@prediabetes@@@.

results.title: Position of indapamide, a diuretic with vasorelaxant activities, in antihypertensive therapy.
results.text_hl: There is, however, still room for new trials evaluating the combination of this diuretic with other types of antihypertensive drugs, in particular a @CHEMICAL_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002118 @@@calcium@@@ antagonist such as @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@. There is also the need to compare the @CHEMICAL_Indapamide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007190 @@@indapamide@@@-@CHEMICAL_Perindopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020913 @@@perindopril@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Indapamide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007190 @@@indapamide@@@-@<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ combinations, in terms of antihypertensive efficacy, tolerability and effects on @<m>DISEASE_Organizing_Pneumonia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000092124 @@@target organ damage@@@ and, ideally, on cardiovascular mortality.

citations.NLM: Waeber B, Rotaru C, Feihl F. Position of indapamide, a diuretic with vasorelaxant activities, in antihypertensive therapy. Expert Opin Pharmacother. 2012 Jul;13(10):1515-26. PMID: 22725706
